properties.Name: BudgetedIncomeRevenueItem
properties.Description: The revenue items accounted for in the budgeted income section of the budgeted income statement.

Columns.Name: BudgetedIncomeStatementId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Budgeted Income Statement.

Columns.Name: BudgetedIncomeStatementVersionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Budgeted Income Statement Version.

Columns.Name: RevenueItemId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a revenue item.

Columns.Name: BudgetedRevenueItemAmount
Columns.Description: The budgeted amount of the associated revenue item applied to the budgeted income statement.

Columns.Name: ActualRevenueItemAmount
Columns.Description: The actual amount of the associated revenue item applied to the budgeted income statement.
